title: Acima provides lease-to-own options at Levin Furniture through multi-year agreement
statement: Acima Leasing began providing lease-to-own options at Levin Furniture & Mattress with a multi-year agreement on April 16, 2024.

citations.quote: Acima Leasing now provides lease-to-own options at Levin Furniture & Mattress with multi-year agreement 04/16/2024
